scripts.html: npm run handlebars && npm run miniHtml
scripts.css: npm run postcss:main && npm run postcss:pasta && npm run postcss:recipe
scripts.miniHtml: npm run miniHtml:main && npm run miniHtml:pasta && npm run miniHtml:cookies
scripts.assets: cp -R src/assets dist/ && cp src/favicon.ico dist/
scripts.pwa: cp src/manifest.json dist/ && cp src/js/sw.js dist/ && npm run miniJs:sw
scripts.js: mkdir dist/js && cp src/js/registersw.js dist/js/ && npm run miniJs:registersw
scripts.miniJs: npm run miniJs:registersw && npm run miniJs:sw
scripts.watch: npm run watch:hbs & npm run watch:css & npm run watch:assets
scripts.watch:js: onchange 'src/js/registersw.js' -- npm run js && onchange 'src/js/sw.js' -- npm run pwa
scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir dist && cp CNAME dist/ && npm run html && npm run css && npm run assets && npm run js && npm run pwa
